external_games.name: Nobunaga's Ambition: Taishi - シナリオ「沖田畷の戦い」/Scenario "The Battle of Okitanawate"

name: Nobunaga's Ambition: Taishi - The Battle of Okitanawate Scenario
summary: An additional scenario available for "Nobunaga's Ambition: Taishi." Following the defeat of the Otomo by the Shimazu, the Ryuzoji clan began to build up their own forces. This left the battle for Kyushu between the Shimazu and Ryuzoji clans.
